headline: Exclusive-India plans to ease nuclear liability laws to attract foreign firms, sources say
summary: India is planning to ease its nuclear liability laws to cap accident-related penalties on equipment suppliers, three government sources said, in a move mainly to attract U.S. firms that have been...
